name: object_detection
template: v4l2src device="{source[path]}" ! image/jpeg,width=640,height=480,framerate=30/1 ! decodebin ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! gvadetect inference-id=inf0 model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvaidentify tracker=true ! gvametaconvert converter=json method=detection source="{source[path]}" name="jsonmetaconvert" include-no-detections=true ! gvametapublish method="{destination[type]}" address="{destination[host]}" topic="{destination[topic]}" timeout=1000 ! queue ! appsink name=appsink
